Enumeration Type Documentation

enum clt_nesting_level

Possible levels of the nesting.

Currently this is 2: there are "top" entities (files, extent locks), and "sub" entities (stripes and stripe locks). This is used only for debugging counters right now.

Enumerator:
CNL_TOP 
CNL_SUB 
CNL_NR
